content:
If FRIENDS RECONCILED, go to 213.12a

You try to convince Bo to join the crowd, but he shakes his head. "That's okay. I'm having fun just watching. Honest." He lets out a wistful sigh. "Besides…the person I'd want to be with isn't here, anyway…" Despite his attitude, you get the feeling Bo is enjoying the festival in his own way. You spend some quiet time with him before rejoining the others.

Discard all   from Bo and add 1 mirth token to him. Each Ranger soothes 1 fatigue. Ready FUN AND GAMES.

213.12a

Together with Bo and Olyv, you sample every one of the confectioner's pastries until all of you are stuffed. "I can't eat another bite," Bo says, patting his belly.

"Wanna bet?" Olyv grabs one more roll and playfully jams it against Bo's lips. The two of them fall into a fit of laughter as he attempts to fight off the pastry attack.

Discard all   from Olyv and Bo and add 1 mirth token to each of them. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue. Ready FUN AND GAMES.
